An eco-friendly, biodegradable, and compostable trash can made from recycled plastic to reduce environmental waste.

A smart trash can with sensors and an app that analyzes the weight of trash, suggesting to users when they should dispose of their trash to encourage more frequent waste management to prevent overflowing.
A compact, foldable trash can for easy storage in small spaces, which can be expanded for use and folded back down when not in use.
A trash can with built-in composting features that separates the trash into different sections, allowing for easier processing and more efficient composting.
A solar-powered trash can with a lighting feature that allows users to see inside the can, reducing the need to bend down and touch the trash.
